price: 23. Ciertamente, quienes crean, obren rectamente y se sometan con humildad a su Señor serán los habitantes del Paraíso y allí vivirán eternamente.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَخۡبَتُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wa-akhbatū ilā rabbihim ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
